channel.title: ::starter command
channel.description: How can I make it so that they can only get ::starter once even if they log out?

item.title: ::starter command
item.dc:creator: @xXx_gl0wi_xXx xXx gl0wi xXx
item.description:
@xXx_gl0wi_xXx wrote:

Use this starter, just change the items and all that shit.

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 50000);
addItem(392, 200);
sendMessage(“Project Delting Starter Package”);
sendMessage(“Don’t try to use ::starter agian it won’t work!”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is a noob and is trying to get a extra starter!! :p");

        }
    }[/code]

Nty.

Read full topic
